name: GENKI NICHI!!
description: In GENKI NICHI!! (今日は元気だから僕が素晴らしい日を！,  kyou wa genki da kara boku ga subarashii nichi wo!, literally: I feel good today so I'll have a wonderful day!) our protagonist sets out to have a great day, when he suddenly dies. Now he has to complete death’s trials in an attempt to try to get control of his life back.
